md:
giải nghĩa từ "exhibits" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Exhibits (noun) - Triển lãm, trưng bày

+ Meaning: Something that is shown or displayed to the public, such as an art exhibition or a trade show.

+ Example sentence: The museum's new exhibits feature ancient artifacts from around the world.

+ Related words: display, showcase, presentation, demonstration

+ Synonyms: displays, showcases, presentations, demonstrations

* Exhibits (verb) - Trưng bày, giới thiệu

+ Meaning: To show or display something to the public, such as an art exhibition or a product.

+ Example sentence: The company will exhibit its new product at the trade show next week.

+ Related words: display, showcase, present, demonstrate

+ Synonyms: displays, showcases, presents, demonstrates
html:
giải nghĩa từ "exhibits" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

  • Exhibits (noun) - Triển lãm, trưng bày

  • Meaning: Something that is shown or displayed to the public, such as an art exhibition or a trade show.

  • Example sentence: The museum's new exhibits feature ancient artifacts from around the world.

  • Related words: display, showcase, presentation, demonstration

  • Synonyms: displays, showcases, presentations, demonstrations

  • Exhibits (verb) - Trưng bày, giới thiệu

  • Meaning: To show or display something to the public, such as an art exhibition or a product.

  • Example sentence: The company will exhibit its new product at the trade show next week.

  • Related words: display, showcase, present, demonstrate

  • Synonyms: displays, showcases, presents, demonstrates
